Purpose: To detect HTLV-1 bZIP factor (HBZ) mRNA in tissue for the diagnosis and study of HTLV-1-associated diseases.
Container: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue block or slide (FFPE tissue cassette/adhesive-coated microscope slide)
Equipment: Microtome, water bath, hybridization oven, fluorescence or bright-field microscope
